MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  L10 postcode area of Liverpool affecting properties in Cranwell Close and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 08:49AM. Our engineers are on their way to the substation to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by Midday today. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:57AM on 30th November 2020
